Total: Total number of DNS queries served.
No Error: Number of DNS queries resolved without an error
NX Domain: Number of DNS queries server has responded to with NS Domain
Refused: Number of DNS queries server has refused to answer
Authoritative: Number of Authoritative queries server has answered
Recursive: Number of Recursive DNS queries server has answered
Cached: Number of DNS queries server has answered from cache
Blocked: Number of DNS queries server has blocked
Clients: Number of client devices server has answered to
